content: Very enlightening. I had recently fallen into the scale trap. Started with something that I believed was badly needed which was simple & just a few services. Then my ears were full of “you’ll get killed by competition if you don’t scale fast” or “you need to increase your offerings” and I did that. But immediately quality suffered, too many things to manage which meant many things could go wrong and we started getting poor customer feedback. Last week, I cut down every new service and went back to ones that would make the customer go WOW! In the process we are having to say No to a few customer requests. I’d rather be honest than provide half baked service.
